text: The June 2012 derecho was a natural disaster in the United States that occurred on June 29, 2012. A line of thunderstorms formed in the Midwest in the afternoon and tracked across the Ohio Valley and the Mid-Atlantic states. 28 people were killed and thousands were left without power for days due to a heatwave in the area. Category:Natural disasters in the United States Category:2012 in the United States Category:June 2012 events
title: June 29, 2012 derecho
